channel.title: Others can't connect to my server? Immediate logout and T2 error?
channel.description:
Hey everyone.
Other people can't connect to my server, only I can. They immediately get logged out and the T2 error comes up. How do I fix this?
It says.. Connection From *whatever the ip is* Client Handler: Client null disconnected *Same ip*
No one but I can connect.
Thanks for the help in advance! :)

item.title: Others can't connect to my server? Immediate logout and T2 error?
item.dc:creator: @CookieScape CookieScape
item.description:
@CookieScape wrote:

[quote=“AP Exams, post:4, topic:391608”][quote author=Saphire` link=topic=488769.msg3573124#msg3573124 date=1303206026]
Their client UID may not correspond with the UID you set for the server, or their cache is not compatible with your server.
[/quote]

How do I change the UID?

And the picture is attached.[/quote]

Go into your signlink class and search “UID”.

Read full topic
item.source: Others can't connect to my server? Immediate logout and T2 error?
